Description: Two twisted lengths of dark brown hair yarn of decreasing thickness from the starting point of manufacture to the tip (endpoint) presenting one of them a knot on its construction; length of hair 1 ply I pleated on the half (over itself) forming a kink and loosely twisted in Z.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Kulubnarti, 21-S-2, G3 outside south wall fill
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Donated by: W S Webb Museum of Anthropology (University of Kentucky)
